meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Gutierrezia, especially G. sarothrae, found in western North America.
meanings.sent1: The snakeweeds grew abundantly in the dry desert soil.
meanings.sent2: Hikers often admire the beauty of snakeweeds along the trail.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit tried to hide behind the tall snakeweeds.
meanings.sent4: The snakeweeds swayed gently in the breeze, resembling a sea of green waves.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant yellow flowers of the snakeweeds brightened the arid landscape.

meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Polygonum, especially P. bistortoides, found in western North America.
meanings.sent1: The snakeweeds near the river provided shelter for small animals.
meanings.sent2: Botanists study the unique characteristics of snakeweeds in the region.
meanings.sent3: The farmer accidentally watered the snakeweeds instead of the crops.
meanings.sent4: The snakeweeds intertwined like a secret garden hidden in the meadow.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the snakeweeds filled the air with a sweet fragrance.
